description:
When an accident transforms Paruko into a baby, it`s up to Gao to provide commentary on the Buddyfight match between Gaito and Tasuku. Guru Bunbuku and Gao`s buddies are in a race against time to find the cure.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Paruko ga Babu! Kiba-ou, Hajimete no Jikkyou!!
Paruko`s a Baby? Gao`s First Commentary!
パル子がバブ~っ! 牙王, 初めての実況!!
